actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act in order to give the Federal Power Commission emergency authority to allocate supplies of natural gas for agricultural purposes.
short_title: Emergency Agricultural Natural Gas Allocation Act

summary.text: Emergency Agricultural Natural Gas Allocation Act - Authorizes emergency assistance to the extent necessary to prevent interruption or curtailment of natural gas used for any agricultural purpose, including irrigation pumping, except that priority will be given to maintenance of natural gas service to existing residential and small commercial users.

titles.title: Emergency Agricultural Natural Gas Allocation Act
A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act in order to give the Federal Power Commission emergency authority to allocate supplies of natural gas for agricultural purposes.
